name: secondary-origin-request
description: Viewer Request Edge Lambda for Dashkite Site

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules lib deploy; mkdir lib; mkdir deploy; npm install; coffee --transpile --inline-map -o lib/ src/; rm -rf node_modules; npm install --only=production; cp -r node_modules lib/node_modules; cp src/environment.hbs lib/environment.hbs; rm lib/environment.js; cp -R lib ../../../files/default-lambdas/secondary/origin-request

author: David Harper
